trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The quick-witted scavenger is concerned for his friends' safety.

TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_000<tab>Oh, my poor friends! Left to be eaten by horrid beasts! I feel terrible about running away, but what choice did I have? No point in us all being killed, now is there?

TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_001<tab>Finding someone to go in and retrieve the bodies─I mean, rescue them would absolve me of the blame, yes? If you could go to the ruins of Kelk to look for two Mord scavengers, I would be very grateful!
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_010<tab>If anything has happened to my friends, I will never hear the end of it!

TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_021<tab>But it is too early to celebrate. The youngest of our group is still missing. Please, you must find him! I will wait for you outside the ruins in case you need help carrying whatever is left of the poor boy.
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_040<tab>Phew... Does that count as a “near-death experience”? I cannot wait to tell my friends!
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_041<tab>But first, we should make a hasty retreat, yes?
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_050<tab>That was the most excitement I have had in a long time! Thank you!
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_060<tab>I cannot thank you enough for saving us. But how did you know we were here?
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_061<tab>Hmm... Running away turned out to be the best choice. Not only did he escape, but he sent for help, too.

TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_062<tab>If he had tried to rescue us himself, we would probably all be dead by now. “Better to run and scavenge another day,” yes? I must remember to thank him.
